title: ChiBitCTy
author: ChiBitCTy
content: I somehow randomly came across this article that discusses how the US based sandwich shop Which Wich ran a promotion selling these crypto boxes with coin tied to actual bitcoin value that could be used in stores to purchase food. As many of you know already and I know many of us here own some of these physical coins they made, but did anyone come across these crypto boxes or have one for sale?

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: I bought a few of these, let me know if you still want one.  It's an interesting coin, as they say it follows the value of Bitcoin, but I have not figured it out, as BTC is up compared to when they were released, but the current redemption is lower than when it was launched:https://www.whichwich.com/cryptobox/Let me know.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on May 22, 2023, 11:09:42 PMI bought a few of these, let me know if you still want one.  It's an interesting coin, as they say it follows the value of Bitcoin, but I have not figured it out, as BTC is up compared to when they were released, but the current redemption is lower than when it was launched:https://www.whichwich.com/cryptobox/Let me know.We have sandwich shop here but they never had em - would be interested in one possibly if available.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Here is a good deal on them on ebay, price is decent:https://www.ebay.com/itm/255622077597 If they sell out, I have ones I could sell for the same price including shipping, but try there first, as I like my collectibles... lolThanks!Mark

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on May 24, 2023, 02:07:33 PMHere is a good deal on them on ebay, price is decent:https://www.ebay.com/itm/255622077597 If they sell out, I have ones I could sell for the same price including shipping, but try there first, as I like my collectibles... lolThanks!MarkYou sold me a couple probably about a year ago now (holy fuck time flies), and I know you got them directly from a shop, do you ever remember seeing the boxes there? I've followed "Which Wich physical cryptocurrency coin" on ebay every since I found out about these but I've yet to ever see one of these boxes pop up on there.  I wonder if they even exist in real life, perhaps this just was for promotion purposes.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on May 25, 2023, 01:31:59 AMQuote from: Markzellers on May 24, 2023, 02:07:33 PMHere is a good deal on them on ebay, price is decent:https://www.ebay.com/itm/255622077597 If they sell out, I have ones I could sell for the same price including shipping, but try there first, as I like my collectibles... lolThanks!MarkYou sold me a couple probably about a year ago now (holy fuck time flies), and I know you got them directly from a shop, do you ever remember seeing the boxes there? I've followed "Which Wich physical cryptocurrency coin" on ebay every since I found out about these but I've yet to ever see one of these boxes pop up on there.  I wonder if they even exist in real life, perhaps this just was for promotion purposes. they exist - the guy that did the 509 chips - spokanistan (sp?) saw them in person at a shop. and the shop by me knew about them but said they only sold 2 before they sent the rest back due to low sales volumes.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: I drove around forever to find one:

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on May 25, 2023, 03:29:13 AMI drove around forever to find one:Very nice, thanks for sharing! I’m assuming you’ve only got one, or do you perhaps have another ? Of course I’d love to buy one if you do and if it’s for sale.
